pullRequest.title: refactor(aws-api): Remove old user-agent header
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
There was a redundant user agent being added to API auth interceptors. Removed it to prevent clashing with the actual user agent being added by UserAgentInterceptor.
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message: Remove old user-agent header from API interceptor
